import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Usd = (props) => { const [state, setstate] = useState({ currency_1 : "", currency_2 : "", input_1 : "" }) const [dataOperationcomplete, setDataSend] = useState({ general_info : "", complete_info : "" }) const handleUserInput = (event) =>{ const { name , value } = event.target setstate((prevState)=>{ return { ...state, [name] : value } }) } use const handleSubmit = async (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() console.log("inside handle submit",state) await getData(state) } const getData = (data) =>{ props.getData(data) } return ( <>
); } export default Usd;
